name: pensopay Checkout Terms (Subscriptions)
author: Thagaard Konsulenthus

sections.description:
This plugin adds the required extra terms and conditions checkbox on checkout when a subscription-product is in cart.
VISA/Mastercard require specific consent before subscribing a creditcard.

Translation-template included (We suggest using Loco Translate)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin\’s folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install it through the plugin installer.

  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress or after installation.

  3. Find the settings-page under Settings and Pensopay Checkout Terms Settings where you can edit the checkbox, error-message and select the required terms and conditions page.

Need to translate for multilanguage sites? We suggest using Loco Translate plugin (Translate-template included in plugin)
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added options for clickable checkout link

1.0.0

  • First release
